instruction: Generate a recipe for a vegan-friendly smoothie.
output: You will need the following ingredients for a vegan-friendly smoothie: 1 cup frozen mango chunks, 1/2 cup frozen coconut milk, 1/2 cup pineapple juice, 1/2 cup almond milk, 1 banana, and 2 tablespoons of honey. Place all the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Pour the smoothie into glasses and enjoy!
